sql_query.sql: INSERT INTO "myauth_user" ("password", "last_login", "is_superuser", "email", "first_name", "last_name", "is_staff", "is_active", "date_joined", "username", "extra_field") VALUES ('md5$L8MZNWiKd8xmcljbZoIusZ$7c12190df39a16ac8254e21ae5f287d1', NULL, false, 'testuser@example.com', '', '', false, true, '2024-07-22T17:28:05.984656+00:00'::timestamptz, 'testuser', '') RETURNING "myauth_user"."id"
